Translations.Text: Alipha- lama-ra, egulo hacche ayata mahagrantha o suspasta kura'anera
Kakhano kakhano kaphirara akankha karabe ye, tara yadi musalima hata
Taderake charuna, tara khete thakuka [1], bhoga karate thakuka ebam asa taderake mohacchanna rakhuka [2], atahpara acire'i tara janate parabe
Ara amara ye janapadake'i dhbansa karechi tara jan'ya chila ekati nirdista lipibad'dha kala
kono jati tara nirdista kalake tbaranbita karate pare na, bilambita'o karate pare na
Ara tara bale, ‘he ai byakti, yara prati yikara [1] nayila hayeche! Tumi to niscaya unmada
‘Tumi satyabadidera antarbhukta haye thakale amadera kache pheresataderake upasthita karacha na kena
amara pheresataderake yathartha karana chara prerana kari na; ara (pheresatara upasthita hale) takhana tara ara abakasa peta na
Niscaya amara'i kura'ana nayila karechi ebam amara abasya'i tara sanraksaka
Ara abasya'i apanara age amara agekara aneka sampradayera kache rasula pathiyechilama
Ara tadera kache emana kona rasula aseni yake tara thatta-bidrupa karata na
Ebhabe'i amara aparadhidera antare ta sancara kari
era kura'anera prati imana anabe na, ara abasya'i gata hayeche purbabartidera riti
Ara yadi amara tadera jan'ya akasera daraja khule de'i atahpara tara tate arohana karate thake
tabu'o tara balabe, amadera drsti sam'mohita kara hayeche; na, baram amara eka jadugrasta sampradaya
Ara abasya'i amara akasera burujasamuha srsti karechi [1] ebam darsakadera jan'ya seguloke susobhita karechi
ebam pratyeka abhisapta sayatana hate amara seguloke suraksita karechi
kintu ke'u curi kare [1] sunate ca'ile [2] pradipta sikha [3] tara pascad'dhabana kare
Ara yamina, etake amara bistrta karechi, tate parbatamala sthapana karechi; ebam amara tate pratyeka bastu udagata karechi suparimitabhabe
Ara amara tate jibikara byabastha karechi tomadera jan'ya ebam tomara yadera riyikadata na'o tadera jan'ya'o
Ara amadera kache'i ache pratyeka bastura bhandara ebam amara ta parijnata parimane'i nayila kare thaki
Ara amara brsti-garbha bayu patha'i, tarapara akasa hate pani nayila kare ta tomaderake pana karate de'i [1]; athaca tomara nijera ta bhandare jamakari na'o
Ara amara'i jibana dana kari o mrtyu ghata'i ebam amara'i curanta malikanara adhikari
Ara abasya'i amara tomadera madhya theke yara agragami hayeche taderake jani ebam abasya'i jani taderake yara pascate gamanakari
Ara niscaya apanara raba taderake samabeta karabena; niscaya tini prajnamaya, sarbajna
Ara abasya'i amara manusa srsti karechi gandhayukta kadara suska thanathane kalace mati theke
ara era age amara srsti karechi jinaderake ati usna [1] nirdhuma aguna theke
Ara smarana karuna, yakhana apanara raba pheresataderake balalena, niscaya ami gandhayukta kadara suska thanathane kalace mati hate manusa srsti karate yacchi
atahpara yakhana ami take suthama karaba ebam tate amara paksa theke ruha sancara karaba [1] takhana tomara tara prati sijadabanata hayo
atahpara pheresatagana saba'i ekatre sajada karala
ibalisa chara, se sajadakaridera antarbhukta hate asbikara karala
Allah‌ balalena, ‘he ibalisa! Tomara ki hala ye, tumi sajadakaridera antarbhukta hale na?’
Se balala, ‘apani gandhayukta kadara suska thanathane kalace mati hate ye manusake srsti karechena ami take sajada karara na'i.’
Tini balalena, tabe tumi ekhana theke bera haye ya'o, karana niscaya tumi bitarita
ara niscaya pratidana dibasa paryanta tomara prati ra'ila la’nata
Se balala, he amara raba! Yedina tadera punarut'thana kara habe sedina paryanta amake abakasa dina
Tini balalena, niscaya tumi abakasapraptadera ekajana
sunirdista samaya asara dina paryanta
Se balala, ‘he amara raba! Apani ye amake bipathagami karalena se jan'ya abasya'i ami yamine manusera kache papakajake sobhana kare tulaba ebam abasya'i ami tadera saba'ike bipathagami karaba
tabe tadera madhye apanara ekanta bandagana chara
Allah‌ balalena, eta'i amara kache paumchara sarala patha
Bibhrantadera madhye ye tomara anusarana karabe se chara amara bandadera upara tomara kona'i ksamata thakabe na
ara niscaya jahannama tadera sabara'i pratisruta sthana
‘setara satati daraja ache [1], pratyeka daraja diye prabesa karara jan'ya (sayatanera anusaridera) nirdista ansa rayeche [2].’
Niscaya muttakira thakabe jannate o prasrabanasamuhera madhye
Taderake bala habe, ‘tomara santite nirapattara sathe ete prabesa kara [1].’
Ara amara tadera antara hate bidbesa dura karaba [1]; tara bha'iyera mata paraspara mukhomukhi haye asane abasthana karabe
sekhane taderake abasada sparsa karabe na ebam tara sekhana theke bahiskrta'o habe na
Amara bandaderake janiye dina ye, niscaya ami'i parama ksamasila, parama dayalu
